messages.message:
https://instabase.com/newsletter-signup/

:sheep: suggestion: revise `Get Smarter On AI` to `Get smarter on AI` (casing)
(or reword entirely)
Synchronicity! I just updated our writing guidelines on this point. https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DOCS/pages/2007138305/Writing+guidelines#Favor-lowercase

thinking this:bulb:out loud: create a Google Docs/Sheets/wherever writing is possible plug-in/extension (similar to what we saw possible in today's All-Hands and the sale process Sheets demo) that can compare/revise doc to adhere to those writing guidelines (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DOCS/pages/2007138305/Writing+guidelines#Favor-lowercase)
